title: Jungle Emperor Leo
alternative_title: Jungle Taitei Movie (1997), ジャングル大帝　劇場版
description: Leo, King of the Jungle, lives at the foot of Moon Mountain. His family life is threatened when a group of humans come in search of Moonlight Stones. Only concerned with money, they have no regard for the jungle. Leo must fight to protect the world he loves, or lose everything!
